DOC.brief_summary: A study compare efficacy surgical treatment SUI ( Stress Urinary Incontinence ) , tot minisling .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Minisling Versus Transobturator ( TOT ) Sling
DOC.detailed_description: eligibility criterion : female stress urinary incontinence
DOC.criteria: clinical urodynamic diagnosis SUI patient 18 90 year postvoid residual urine volume 100 ml , coagulation disorder , current urinary tract infection , sequelae previous radiation therapy pelvis , anticoagulant therapy , vulvovaginitis , anesthesia contraindication
